website_summaries.verdict: This lightweight gel eye cream concentrates on hydrating the eye area to smooth out fine lines and under-eye puffiness.
pros: The gel contains soothing comfrey leaf and pennywort herb to improve elasticity
It goes on cool for a refreshing burst of hydration and blends in easily
Its effects are long-lasting, and it works well as a primer under makeup
cons: Despite being lightweight, a few users reported the occurrence of milia on the eyelids

customer_reviews.title: Best Eye Cream I've Ever Used
customer_reviews.text: Originally purchased this from S*ph*ra several times, but they are frequently out of stock. This is hands down THE best eye cream I've ever used. It's not congesting around the under eye area, I use it from corner to corner and over my eyelids, and I honestly notice fewer fine lines AND fewer expression lines. Love this stuff.
customer_reviews.author: UberFoodie

customer_reviews.title: So worth the money!
customer_reviews.text: I use this on my eyes and forehead, though I know its marketed for eyes only. I have always had forehead lines, even as a teen. This takes away my tired, saggy eyes and makes my forehead lines less noticable. It smells so nice, and while it's pricey (for my budget), I think it's worth it. Just s tiny dab goes a long way!
customer_reviews.author: JuliaSto

customer_reviews.title: This changes everything for me!!!
customer_reviews.text: My journey of finding the perfect eye cream stops here, with this perfection of an eye cream. I am so in love. I use it every night. It keeps my eye areas moisturized. I also wake up feeling more refreshed. Eyes are less dry and tired. I have sensitive eyes and this is the first cream I’ve used that doesn’t cause irritation. So happy with this product. I like how it doesn’t have a strong fragrance. If glides easily. Doesn’t get into my eyes. And best of all, it hydrates without causing problems.
customer_reviews.author: TeeTeeReviews

customer_reviews.title: Just okay—not for those who use retinoids.
customer_reviews.text: I like this product, but even with twice daily use, I have some flaky under eye skin. I use a lot of anti-acne meds so I was hoping for something that could stand up to them. This would probably work best for someone that doesn’t use retinol products.
customer_reviews.author: Mary K.

customer_reviews.title: Great for moisturizing, but way too heavy on the fragrances/oils.
customer_reviews.text: This moisturizer is very lightweight, hydrating and quickly absorbs into the skin. The fragrance, though, is too much. I do not have sensitive skin, but my under eyes hate this moisturizer. If you have sensitive skin/eyes, I would look for something else. If Belif ever decides to make this without the unnecessary fragrances/oils, I would definitely try it again, as I really enjoy the texture and feel of this eye cream.
customer_reviews.author: sheree elliott

customer_reviews.title: My favorite eye cream
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been using this for almost a year and I love it. I have dry, sensitive skin and I’m prone to milia but this works perfectly for all of these issues.
customer_reviews.author: Morgan Rhe

customer_reviews.title: FACIAL AREA
customer_reviews.text: Excellent for my needs. Everyone is different. Talk with experts on all items especially for facial area
customer_reviews.author: Donna M. Roth

customer_reviews.title: The Best Ever
customer_reviews.text: This is my Holy Grail for eye creams.....this does not disappoint.
customer_reviews.author: Martha L. Boal

customer_reviews.title: Favorite part of my morning routine!
customer_reviews.text: I love that it's cooling. It wakes me up in the morning!
customer_reviews.author: Lauren

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Love this product! My skin is sensitive to everything, but doesn’t react at all to this product line.
customer_reviews.author: Brenda S. Schiro

customer_reviews.title: My under eye area which was dry, is now well hydrated.
customer_reviews.text: belif Moisturizing Eye Bomb | Gentle Eye Cream for Dry Skin | Soothing, Clean Beauty I really like this eye cream. It arrived quickly and without any damaged or broken pieces. I have been using it for about three weeks and am very happy with the results so far. My under eye area which was dry, is now well hydrated. Some of my fine lines have also lessened. I like how quickly it absorbs into my skin, making applying makeup much easier. I like that this company is focusing on cleaner beauty. It makes me feel much safer knowing that I am not putting unnecessary chemicals on my skin.
customer_reviews.author: Tim

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Super smoothing! I use this cream with the moisturizer. They absorbe very quick (with the proper serum!) and my skin do feel more soft. Even after the first use. I have been using it for the last couple of weeks, I did not notice my crow lines different BUT I do feel my skin more moisturized and smooth. I really really like this brand. Before this I never heard of it before, but definitely I will recommend to my friends and keep using it. Does not have any scent. And it does not make my sensitive skin react. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Constanza Vargas

customer_reviews.title: Supple Skin
customer_reviews.text: The cream is silky and soothing on the most delicate skin around my eyes. I get itchy, tired eyes often. I also get dry patches on my skin around my eyes and this cream smoothed everything nicely and soothed the itch. I highly recommend using this cream daily for any skin type. It leaves no residue nor does it irritate.
customer_reviews.author: sunday

customer_reviews.title: My Favorite Belif Product
customer_reviews.text: I have several Belif products and this is the one that gives visible results quickly. My eyes have wrinkles and what bothers me most is that my under eye area is darker than the rest of my face. This eye cream actually seems to lighten the area under my eyes which makes me feel a lot better about how I look. When I put make-up on I don't have to work as hard to cover that area. And, this product seems to keep the darkness away all day. This product is expensive, but if it keeps on working I will continue to buy it.
customer_reviews.author: Serena

customer_reviews.title: Wow!!!!  Amazing - from a former Aveda and Clinique employee
customer_reviews.text: I used to work for Aveda and Clinique and have had the opportunity to try lots of different skin products. This may be my very favorite eye cream I've ever tried. The aroma is nice - it actually reminds me a lot of the Aveda skin care products. It's very botanical-smelling. The moisture though.... It's so good. I put it on at night and I can still feel it the next morning. It makes all of the eye area feel so moisturized. This is the first product I've ever used by belif, and I am impressed. Very recommended! ~Amy
customer_reviews.author: Steve and Amy

customer_reviews.title: Moisture bomb for under the eyes
customer_reviews.text: If you need extra moisture for the skin under your eyes that is lightweight but very hydrating, this is great eye cream. I could tell my skin was needing a boost and this eye cream did the trick. I apply in the evening and it absorbs well. While I sleep, it's hydrating my skin. Works really well and good for sensitive skin as well.
customer_reviews.author: kcee74

customer_reviews.title: Nice lightweight eye cream!
customer_reviews.text: I like this eye cream! It’s a little more pricey than I normally pay but it’s lightweight, feels refreshing and cooling when you put it on. I see other reviews about the fragrance but I don’t think it smells strong. Has a nice light scent to me and I’m usually sensitive to scents. I have pretty sensitive skin (& eyes) but so far this hasn’t bothered me at all. Ive only been using it a week or so so I can’t give any long term results but so far I really like it!
customer_reviews.author: Kim

customer_reviews.title: it's not fragrance free
customer_reviews.text: it's very moisturizing, no complaints. i love using it but only on nights when i sleep by myself because the man in my life is very sensitive to perfumey smell. it goes away quick, but it's still noticeable. other than the scent, great cream.
customer_reviews.author: JijieF

customer_reviews.title: I really like this eye bomb
customer_reviews.text: I had received a sample size of this before, so I knew I liked it. It’s one of the best eye moisturizers I have used. I really like it, has no scent, absorbs quickly
customer_reviews.author: marmar

customer_reviews.title: belif eye cream
customer_reviews.text: This cream had a citrus-like scent that I found kind of strong. I wish it was more subtle. Otherwise, I was satisfied with it. It felt pleasant on my skin and absorbed quickly, without issues. I have dry skin, and it left my eye area moisturized and smoother looking.
customer_reviews.author: Alla S.

customer_reviews.title: Cool and Refreshing!
customer_reviews.text: My wife loves belif products! She says this is very cool and refreshing. It has a good scent and doesn't smell. Feels great on eyes and very easy to apply. She also uses aqua bomb and other products from them and has always been very happy!
customer_reviews.author: Devin Stephens

customer_reviews.title: Works good
customer_reviews.text: Light weights, goes on smooth, no greasy feel, adds moisture, eyes do not look as tired.
customer_reviews.author: Cyn

product_meta.title: | belif Moisturizing Eye Bomb | Gentle Eye Cream for Dry Skin | Soothing, Clean Beauty
product_meta.description:
Formulated with hydrating herb, comfrey leaf, and elasticity-boosting pennywort herb, the Moisturizing Eye Bomb provides a flood of intensive moisture for radiant and youthful-looking eyes. This cooling texture instantly bursts with hydration and blends seamlessly, keeping the eye area supple and hydrated while prepping it for a smooth crease-free makeup application.

BRAND STORY
The undisputed authority in hydration. belif combines time-trusted apothecary herbs and modern skin science to create effective skincare solutions
